mapper.select: -- 获取流程定义数 SELECT COUNT(ID_) from ACT_RE_PROCDEF
-- 获取正在运行的流程实例数 SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PROC_INST_ID_) from act_ru_execution

-- 获取流程定义产生的流程实例数 SELECT p.NAME_, COUNT(DISTINCT e.PROC_INST_ID_) as PiNUM from act_ru_execution AS e RIGHT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF AS p on e.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ WHERE p.NAME_ IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.NAME_ ORDER BY PiNUM LIMIT 0,5
-- 获取流程实例数 select count(*) from ACT_HI_PROCINST where END_TIME_ is not null
-- 获取正在运行的任务数 select count(*) from ACT_HI_TASKINST where END_TIME_ is not NULL
-- 获取每天产生的任务数 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(START_TIME_, '%Y.%m.%d') days, COUNT(START_TIME_) start, COUNT(END_TIME_) end FROM act_hi_taskinst GROUP BY days ORDER BY days DESC LIMIT 0,7
-- 获取今天产生的任务数 SELECT Count(*) FROM act_hi_actinst WHERE DATE_FORMAT(START_TIME_, '%Y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d')
-- 获取今天产生的流程实例数 SELECT Count(*) FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST WHERE DATE_FORMAT(START_TIME_, '%Y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d')
-- 获取今天部署的流程定义数 SELECT Count(*) FROM act_re_deployment WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DEPLOY_TIME_, '%Y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d')
SELECT DISTINCT PROC_DEF_ID_ FROM `act_hi_taskinst` WHERE ID_ = '#{taskId}'
